Content: The Joint Opposition says that the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna has unable to bring in the 20th amendment to the constitution due to lack of a majority. MP Vasudeva Nanayakkara said this addressing a public forum titled "Ratata Hathuru 20 Epa" held in Ruwanwella yesterday (Jul 01). He said that the JVP had brought in the 20 A as a result of United National Party's influence.
